name: Ext_R2_ClaimResponse_totalBenefit
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.ClaimResponse.totalBenefit for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ClaimResponse.totalBenefit from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ClaimResponse|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Total benefit payable for the Claim
element.definition: Total amount of benefit payable (Equal to sum of the Benefit amounts from all detail lines and additions less the Unallocated Deductible).
element.comment: `ClaimResponse.totalBenefit` maps to R4 `ClaimResponse.total.amount`.  So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
